wikipedia_page.main: Sir Thomas Boor Crosby, FRCS (1830 – 7 April, 1916) was a British doctor who was the Lord Mayor of London from 1911 to 1912, having served as Sheriff of the City of London from 1906 to 1907. He was knighted in 1907.

link_mentions.page: List of lord mayors of London

response: Thomas Crosby (1840–1914) was an English missionary in Canada.
Thomas Crosby may also refer to:
*Thomas Crosby (Lord Mayor), Lord Mayor of London
